TopicTitle: Visual Mods that make KSP look like Real Life

Articles.Content: I've been searching for mods that make KSP look really good visually. I came across some excellent mods but not all of them are compatible with each other or at least to my knowledge.  So far AVP and some other mods is the best right now.  I was wondering if someone made a mod pack where there are visual mods and high res planets.

This is the best you can get

I Use it and god it looks so good.

I Thought my PC Can't handle it but nope, it can handle it.
